name: the fighting game that could not fight! (will update this every week even after the jam ends)
name_original: the fighting game that could not fight! (will update this every week even after the jam ends)
description:
a-blue player left

d-blue player right

w-reverse gravity for blue

s- normal gravity for blue 

right shift-blue block

left arrow-left for gray player

right arrow-right for gray player

up arrow- reverse gravity for gray player

down arrow- normal gravity for gray player

left shift- blocking for gray player

to win you have to hit the other player with your block while their not blocking

btw the blocking protection doesn't work while your using your left right keys

swapped attacking for gravity control
